page.title: 07RECREATION AND TOURISM
page.content: Because of its proximity to the Solent our 'D' block is very popular with holidaymakers. From Clarence Pier you can go on a number of cruises run by the Portsmouth Harbour Ferry Company on the M.V. Solent Enterprise to a wide variety of places like: Cowes on the Isle of Wight, Ryde, a Harbour cruise to see the Navy ships, a trip to the Spitsand Fort. Southsea Common often hosts various Rallies and Fairs. All along the seafront at Southsea are placques and monuments to various events. The most dominant monument is the Royal Naval War Memorial which commemorates the dead of both World Wars and marks the eastern edge of our area.
